Package com.airs.handlers

Interface Summary
Handler Interface for sensor handlers
 

Class Summary
AudioHandler Class to read audio-related sensors, specifically the AS and AF sensor
BeaconHandler Class to read audio-related sensors, specifically the BN, BD, BT sensor
BloodPressureButton_selector Activity to self-annotate the blood pressure
BloodPressureButton_widget Widget provider for the blood pressure widget
BloodPressureButtonHandler Class to read blood pressure sensors, specifically the BP sensor
CalendarHandler Class to read calendar sensors, specifically the CA sensor
CellHandler Class to read cellular sensors, specifically the CR, CD, CS, CB, CI, CL, CC sensor
EventButton_selector Activity to self-annotate events
EventButton_widget Widget provider for the event annotation widget
EventButtonHandler Class to read event annotation sensor, specifically the EB sensor
EventTextActivity Activity to self-annotate any text being pasted to AIRS
EventTextHandler Class to read text sharing sensor, specifically the ET sensor
GPSHandler Class to read GPS-based sensors, specifically the GO, GL, GA, GI, GC, GS sensor
HeartMonitorHandler Class to read Zephyr HxM related sensors, specifically the HL, HP, HI sensor
MediaWatcherHandler Class to read media watcher sensors, specifically the MW sensor
MoodButton_iconselector Activity to select the mood icon being chosen for own mood definitions
MoodButton_selector Activity to self-annotate moods
MoodButton_widget Widget provider for the mood widget
MoodButtonHandler Class to read self-annotated mood sensor, specifically the MO sensor
MusicPlayerHandler Class to read music player and spotify related sensors, specifically the MP, MA, ML, MT sensor
NotificationHandler Class to read notification related sensors, specifically the NO sensor
NotificationHandlerService Class to implement the AIRS accessibility service
PhoneSensorHandler Class to read internal phone sensors, specifically the Az, Pi, Ro, PR, LI, PU, TM, HU sensor
RandomHandler Class to read random number generator sensors, specifically the Rd sensor
SystemHandler Class to read system related sensors, specifically the Ba, BV, Bc, BM, Rm, Sc, HS, IC, OC, SR, SS, TR, TV, TE sensor
WeatherHandler Class to read weather related sensors, specifically the VT, VF, VH, VC, VW, VI sensor
WifiHandler Class to read WiFi related sensors, specifically the WF, WI, WM, WS, WC sensor
